title: Dead by Daylight companion app with Internet Identity, multi-section UI, and per-user saved data

requirements.text: Create a multi-section frontend with separate navigable sections: Characters, Perks, Build Planner, Match Tracker, News, and Wiki (not a single combined page).

quotes: Make me an app about Dead By Daylight

acceptanceCriteria: App has a clear navigation UI that links to: Characters, Perks, Build Planner, Match Tracker, News, Wiki.
Each section renders as its own page/view with an appropriate header and empty/loading states.

requirements.text: Add Internet Identity authentication to the app so users can sign in/out and the UI reflects the authenticated state.
acceptanceCriteria: User can sign in and sign out using Internet Identity.
UI shows the current signed-in state (e.g., logged-in indicator and sign-out option).
Unauthenticated users can browse public content but cannot create/save builds, match history, or favorites.

requirements.text: Implement backend support for per-user data keyed by Internet Identity principal, including: saved builds, match history, and favorites (e.g., favorite characters/perks/builds).
acceptanceCriteria: Backend stores data per authenticated principal; users can only read/write their own saved builds, match history, and favorites.
Backend exposes canister methods for CRUD operations for builds, match entries, and favorites.
Unauthenticated calls to user-specific write operations are rejected with a clear error.

requirements.text: Provide a built-in (internal/placeholder) dataset for Dead by Daylight content instead of integrating an external REST API, and expose it through backend query methods for Characters, Perks, News items, and Wiki entries.

quotes: I don’t know if you want to you can delete the REST API

acceptanceCriteria: No external REST API integration is used.
Backend returns lists/details for Characters and Perks from an internal dataset.
Backend returns News items and Wiki entries from an internal dataset.
Frontend can load and display this content via canister calls.

requirements.text: Build the Characters & Perks database UI: list + detail views, with search/filter/sort controls, and the ability for signed-in users to favorite items.
acceptanceCriteria: Characters section displays a list and a detail view for a selected character.
Perks section displays a list and a detail view for a selected perk.
Both lists include a working search field (client-side or server-side).
Signed-in users can favorite/unfavorite characters and perks; favorites persist across reloads.

requirements.text: Implement a Build Planner section that lets signed-in users create, edit, delete, and save custom builds (e.g., role/type selection and perk loadout), and browse their saved builds.
acceptanceCriteria: Signed-in users can create a new build and save it to the backend.
Signed-in users can edit and delete previously saved builds.
Build Planner displays the user’s saved builds list and supports selecting one to view/edit.
Unauthenticated users can view the Build Planner UI but cannot save builds (prompt to sign in).

requirements.text: Implement a Match Tracker section that lets signed-in users record match results and view their match history.
acceptanceCriteria: Signed-in users can add a match entry (at minimum: date/time, role, result, optional notes).
Signed-in users can view a list of their match history sorted by most recent first.
Signed-in users can delete match entries.
Unauthenticated users cannot create or view personal match history and are prompted to sign in.

requirements.text: Add News and Wiki sections that display content from the internal dataset with list + detail views and basic search.
acceptanceCriteria: News section shows a list of news posts and a detail view.
Wiki section shows a list of wiki entries and a detail view.
Both sections include a working search field.
Pages include appropriate empty/loading/error states.

requirements.text: Add a user profile area that summarizes the signed-in user’s saved builds, favorites, and recent matches, with quick links to manage them.
acceptanceCriteria: When signed in, user can access a Profile (or equivalent) page/area.
Profile shows counts and/or previews of: saved builds, favorites, and recent match entries.
Profile provides navigation to the relevant management pages (Build Planner, Characters/Perks, Match Tracker).

requirements.text: Apply a coherent, distinct visual theme for a Dead by Daylight companion app (typography, color palette, layout, components) and enforce it consistently across all sections. Avoid blue/purple as primary branding colors.

quotes: Make me an app about Dead By Daylight

acceptanceCriteria: All pages share a consistent header/nav, spacing system, and component styling.
Theme is dark/horror-inspired and readable, with consistent typography and color usage across the app.
Primary branding colors are not blue/purple.

requirements.text: Generate and include a small set of custom static images for the app (logo and subtle background) and render them from the frontend as static assets.

quotes: Make me an app about Dead By Daylight

acceptanceCriteria: Generated images are placed in frontend/public/assets/generated and are referenced directly by the frontend (not served via backend).
App uses the generated logo in the header and uses the generated background subtly in the layout (without harming readability).

constraints: Backend must remain a single Motoko actor (all logic in one main actor file).
Do not introduce any external database; store data in canister state.
Do not integrate an external Dead by Daylight REST API; use an internal/placeholder dataset.

Frontend must not modify any files under the immutable paths: frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, frontend/src/components/ui.
Use English for all user-facing text.
nonGoals: Real-time features (e.g., chat, live match updates) via WebSockets or push notifications.
Third-party authentication providers other than Internet Identity.
Importing or scraping official Dead by Daylight data from proprietary sources.

required: App logo mark with a dark horror aesthetic (dbd-companion-logo.dim_512x512.png)
Wide subtle grunge/fog background texture, dark and low-contrast (dbd-companion-bg.dim_1920x1080.png)

preferencesToAdd: User-facing text must be in English.
